body.name: NUU A23Plus Unlocked Cell Phone for AT&T, T-Mobile, Cricket, Mint Mobile, Metro, 4G 6.3" 64GB/3GB Worldwide and More, Dual SIM, Black, US Warranty & Hotline 2023- International Unlock
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 14. Order within 14 hrs 57 mins
features: RELIABLE and UNDER $90 Ensures Your Daily Tasks, VideoCalls, Streaming, Social Media, Browsing, Messages, Chatting, Music Listening and Casual Gaming Needs are met Without Breaking the Bank.

AMPLE STORAGE - With 64GB Internal Storage and the Ability to Expand Up to 512GB with a MicroSD Card (sold separately), A23 Plus Gives You All the Space You Need for Your Favorite Apps, Photos, and Videos. Plus, with Nano DUAL SIM Support, You Can Easily Switch Between Carriers to Find the Best Plan for You.
DUAL CAMERAS - Enjoy an 8MP Main Camera for Capturing Precious Moments and a 5MP Front Camera for Video Calls with Loved Ones.

UNLOCKED FOR MAJOR CARRIERS: Compatible with AT&T, Cricket, Unreal Mobile, T-Mobile, H2O Wireless, Tello, Mint Mobile, MetroPCS, Google Fi, Simple Mobile, SpeedTalk Mobile, Black Wireless, Gen Mobile, (NO SIM CARD INCLUDED) and VoLTE/HD Voice Support. NOTE THIS is valid as of Feb 2024, for More Carrier Confirmation Contact Our Customer Support.
NOT COMPATIBLE with Verizon, Boost mobile, Tracfone, Pulse Cellular, Union Wireless, Spectrum. For more carrier information contact our customer support.

INTERNATIONAL PHONE DUAL SIM The Perfect Solution to Stay Connected Wherever You Are In The World. Use Dual SIM, Making Them Versatile and Perfect for Travel. Before your Trip, Check With Your Destination Carrier If you Can "Bring Your Own Device" and if they use ANY of the following bands: 4G-B2/4/5/12/13/25/26/41/66/71, some Operators need to configure APN. NOTE IF BUYING OUTSIDE USA, Check with your Local Customs BEFORE Purchasing to Avoid any Inconveniences.

GREAT BATTERY LIFE -With a 3,850 mAh battery, you can enjoy up to 7.5 hours of video playback, 50 hours of music playing time, or 12 hours of web browsing on a single charge. What's more, the battery is replaceable, so you can easily pop it out by removing the cover. This makes it an ideal choice for those who want a phone that will last for years and can be repaired cheaply. It's a smart and sustainable choice that you won't regret!
HEADPHONE JACK and Clear Case - The A23 Plus gives you the flexibility to use wired or Bluetooth earphones/headphones, and includes in the Package a Clear TPU Case.

ANY PARENTAL CONTROL APP: As a Parent, You Have the Right Tools to Monitor and Manage your Child's Device Usage. Luckily, this Phone Supports any Parental Control App you Choose to Install. With this Flexibility, You Can Take Charge of Your Child's Safety and Guide Them Toward Responsible Device Usage. Choose the Best App That Suits Your Needs and Keep Your Child Protected Today.

ANDROID 13, US WARRANTY, HOTLINE SUPPORT – Run On stock ANDROID 13, which means you won't have to deal with any bloatware or ads. Also We provide 12 MONTHS manufacturer WARRANTY service. If you have any questions about the product, please contact our customer services team with the order ID, we’re always happy to help.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best choice for the price!
reviews.reviewText: Extremely fast delivery. It is a good looking phone it feels very expensive in the hand it is quick The battery lasts literally all day and I'm on my phone quite a bit. I am extremely impressed with how quickly it charges. Probably about 20 to 30 minutes for full charge using the provided c to c cable and block. Has great sound. Very quick I can ask on it well. Overall the best bang for your buck. Came with a clear case charger cord and block starter kit and a pre-installed screen protector Thank God cuz I struggle with those every time Love it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great phone for the price
reviews.reviewText: At $169, zero complaints. Beautiful 120Hz OLED display, feels premium, good sounding mono audio, decent processor. Working great as a display for the Gamesir G8 Gallileo controller. Perfect for Cloud Gaming.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This phone is awful. Lags so much. Takes forever to open apps. Calls can barely be heard. I tried it for a month and I can't believe I waited that long. After two weeks of having it it started to mess up. Def don't recommend this phone. Didnt even want to give it a star.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It’s not the greatest phone, but it’s suitable for basic tasks like calls, text, social media. The camera quality is decent. Can’t beat the price though! It’s a decent phone for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: One of the BEST cellphones I’ve ever owned !! Very pleased with purchase !! I don’t have enough accolades to describe this AWESOME phone !! Everything works just as it should !! Processor is SUPER fast !! Photos are outstanding !! Charges in around 1 hour !! Brilliant and vivid screen !! Huge amount of storage !! Setup was a breeze !! No malfunctions at all !! I call it my Uber phone !! Would definitely buy it again !!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not worth the Bargain but the company promptly addressed my issues
reviews.reviewText: I initially purchased this phone because my previous phone didn't have a removable battery and completely shut down on me. Meanwhile this phone was on sale around the holiday season so I went for it. I really regret this decision because this phone doesn't easily allow me to use my phone data, the picture quality is poor, the speaker phone is as loud as a regular call, the phone is slow ...etc. I'm giving this particular phone a thumbs down.Although I am not satisfied with this purchase, the company was very helpful and quick to rectify my issues. Most companies ignore their customers but this one did not. I value companies that put forth great efforts into their customer satisfaction. However, now I know that in the future, it would be in my best interest to purchase a more expensive phone with all of the bells and whistles so that I'd have better success from the start.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars cannot beat the price and it is a good phone
reviews.reviewText: so far so good. Easy set up. Not really laggy. I just use for a phone and a few apps plus youtube watching

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Really great phone and price. I've had it for a few months now and it's been amazing. Lots of storage and love the camera! So good my husband had to get one too!
